pages.text: This effect will $(marked)steal$() the positive potion effects of any nearby entity and apply them to $(o)you$() instead. Ambient potion effects are an exception to this.

pages.title: Theft
pages.text: Stealing a potion effect will halve its duration.$(br2)This effect is not compatible with $(l:bewitchment:brewing/synchronized)Synchronized$().$(br2)The higher this potion's intensity, the further it'll reach.
